guys were talking about a few theoretical ideas in a conversation, I just d=

reat. Shared the results, rest is history.

I dunno how you got the RVG =

nd if you ever made a drawing of how you did it I have that here someplace =

 image I ever got as well as things shared with me. Thousands of files, but=
 now and then I find I am glad I did =3D) Just because it means nothing tod=
ay doesnt mean it wont=A0make more sense=A0tomorrow hehehe or in some cases=

ember specifically if you posted the schematic for that one but you often d=
o.
